tweet:
BREAKING!!!!

Witnesses at today's Joint Economic Committee hearing, invited by both Republicans AND Democrats, largely agreed:

America faces a CRISIS of economic inequality.

Read more here:  https://www.jec.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/democrats/press-releases?ID=702AF0E4-5C61-476A-9553-B516ECFA41C2 …
#JECHearings #SocialCapital #Inequality

Home prices in Feb. increased at the slowest pace of annual growth since late 2012, according to the S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller 20-city index. Las Vegas led gains w/ 9.7% annual growth, while NY and SF grew only 2.6% and 1.4%. https://www.marketwatch.com/story/home-price-growth-screeches-to-a-6-12-year-low-case-shiller-says-2019-04-30?mod=hp_minor_pos19 …

.@SenGaryPeters brings up how geographic mobility - while useful for upward mobility - can also deplete rural areas. @Patrick_Sharkey talks about ensuring these areas have functioning institutions like childcare, retraining, education & financial institutions. #JECHearing

"Can you speak about the long-lasting consequences of segregation?" asks @RepDavidTrone - requesting more information about how segregation affects the economic mobility and social capital of communities of color. #JECHearing #SocialCapital

.@RepDennyHeck cites some important stats on America's housing market: "Objective analysis suggests we're about 5M homes short in this country," he says, adding: "Construction is not keeping up with demand and wages are not keeping up with prices." #JECHearing #SocialCapital

.@RepDonBeyer, who started working in car dealerships in the 1970s, notes that many Americans  have low credit scores. 

@MAFCEO says credit reports are "passports to the financial marketplace. Without that passport, you are really denied everything." #JECHearing #SocialCapital
Follow the thread and watch the hearing LIVE. #JECHearings #SocialCapital https://twitter.com/JECDems/status/1123230669826605062 …
.@RepBeatty asks whether growing income-opportunity gap is a national emergency. Witnesses largely agree it is, or close to it. #JECHearing #SocialCapital

.@RepDennyHeck cites prolonged, double-digit unemployment in WA-era counties hit by loss of timber jobs. "To me it kind of begs the question however with respect to social capital: Is it destroyed, demeaned, diluted by traumatic job loss?" #SocialCapital #JECHearing

.@SenatorHassan: "Our country was founded on the idea that nurturing the talent and energy of every person promotes human dignity and ignites a vibrant and competitive economy. And government certainly has a role in ensuring that we do just that." #JECHearing #SocialCapital

.@patrick_sharkey: "The neighborhoods in which children are raised play a central role in influencing their academic achievement, cognitive development, physical and mental wellbeing, and economic mobility." #JECDHearing #SocialCapital #econtwitter

"Nationally, one-in-seven Latinos are unbanked," Quiñonez said, adding that, "Nearly one-in-three Latinos are credit invisible, meaning they do not have credit scores or credit reports." #Latino #Unbanked #Credit #SocialCapital #JECHearing
José Quiñonez: "Being poor in America is expensive, particularly for people living outside of the financial mainstream." #SocialCapital #JECHearing #poverty #community

In 1989, 58:1. 
In 2017, 312:1.
